extension.name: Community - Latest group posts
extension.author: JomSocial Team
extension.description: Show recent wall posts from groups

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of wall posts to display (default is 5)

param.name: charcount
param.label: Comment character count
param.description: The number of characters to be displayed for the comments

param.name: afterlogin_setting
param.label: After Login
param.description: To display all public groups or user participated group only
